channel.title: Need help again! :( with my new updated autotalker
channel.description:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,62097.0.html That is my auto talker now here is the question:
How do i make the wait time and howmanyrepeats const in to the form and make the script respond
so for ex how do i make the form that when i put the wait time in the form then it will wait for that much time, same with howmanyrepeats
TY and i wasnt on for a while(exams)
